resources.string:
My name is Marcos Lopes da Silva Junior. I'm 21 years old. Student of Information Systems at FIAP, currently in the 5th semester of the course.
I'm interested in back-end development, but I also have interest in front-end development. I also like to learn about emerging technologies when I have time.
This application is a project for my evaluation of Mobile Development, Games and Internet of Things.

April 30th, 2021
